text.en:
2 Effect Monsters
If this card is Link Summoned using a Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, and/or Link Monster as material: You can target 1 card on the field or in the GY; banish it, also your monsters cannot attack directly for the rest of this turn. When your opponent activates a card or effect (Quick Effect): You can target 2 face-up monsters on the field, including at least 1 monster you control; banish both monsters until the End Phase. You can only use each effect of "S:P Little Night" once per turn.
